summary: Family caregivers play a critical role in supporting the elderly population, which is growing rapidly. However, those who provide eldercare may risk their own employment, income, and retirement security. We looked at other countries' approaches to supporting family members who provide eldercare, and the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services' efforts to develop a U.S. family caregiving strategy. title: Retirement Security: Other Countries' Experiences with Caregiver Policies
